feed.title: ZaneOps Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.8.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Some UI fixes by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/430

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.8.2...v1.8.3

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • feat: bulk deploy services & cancel git service build by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/432
  • feat: static directory builder by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/435
  • feat: Nixpacks builder by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/436
  • feat: Railpack builder by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/443

Bug fixes

  • fix: various bug fixes related to nixpacks builder by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/441
  • fix: kill build process on timeout instead of waiting on it by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/444

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.8.3...v1.9.0

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.9.1
entry.content:

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.9.0...v1.9.1

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.9.2
entry.content:

  • refactor: use container id for healthchecks by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/448

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.9.1...v1.9.2

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.10.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • feat: terminal to services by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/453
  • chore: add telemetry, reduce image size by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/454
  • feat: Terminal to servers by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/457

Others

  • ♻️ use slim Dockerfile for production builds too by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/455

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.9.2...v1.10.0
